text: Can you help me cancel a timed switch for one of my smart devices?
Sure, I can assist you with that. Can you please provide me with the device ID and the time for the switch?
The device ID is 10000025 and the time is 2023-03-19 09:30:00.
Okay, I have cancelled the timed switch for your smart device. Is there anything else I can help you with?
